scripts.commit: gulp lint && npm run build_all && git-cz
scripts.build_cjs: rm -rf dist/cjs   && ./node_modules/.bin/tsc tools/build/bundle.d.ts src/app.ts     -m commonjs --outDir dist/cjs  --sourcemap        --sourceRoot src  --target ES5    -d --diagnostics --pretty --noImplicitAny --noImplicitReturns --experimentalDecorators --suppressImplicitAnyIndexErrors --moduleResolution node
scripts.build_es6: rm -rf dist/es6   && ./node_modules/.bin/tsc tools/build/target-es6.d.ts src/app.ts -m es2015   --outDir dist/es6  --sourcemap        --sourceRoot src  --target ES2015 -d --diagnostics --pretty --noImplicitAny --noImplicitReturns --experimentalDecorators --suppressImplicitAnyIndexErrors --moduleResolution node
scripts.build_test: rm -rf .tmp/test && ./node_modules/.bin/tsc tools/build/test.d.ts test/unit/app.ts -m commonjs --outDir .tmp/     --inlineSourceMap  --sourceRoot test --target ES5       --diagnostics --pretty                                     --experimentalDecorators --suppressImplicitAnyIndexErrors --moduleResolution node
scripts.watch: ./node_modules/.bin/tsc tools/build/test.d.ts test/unit/app.ts -m commonjs --outDir .tmp/     --inlineSourceMap  --sourceRoot test --target ES5       --diagnostics --pretty                                     --experimentalDecorators --suppressImplicitAnyIndexErrors --moduleResolution node -w
scripts.build_all: npm run build_cjs && npm run build_bundle && npm run build_mock && npm run build_es6
scripts.prepublish: npm run test && npm run build_all
